labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: The name now shows the verified check and you are no longer able to change it for what was added.
data.expected_result: The name of the game should still be able to be changed.
data.short_description: Change name in Now Playing to verified game and can not change again.
data.steps_to_repro: - User Settings > Games - Click 'Add it!' and add a game. - Change the name of the added program to a verified game (Ex: Starcraft) - Game will now appear as verified game and you can not change it.
